string-array.name: mole_interpretations_forehead
string-array.item: A mole on the {location} signifies leadership and authority. It suggests that you have a natural ability to take charge and inspire others.
A mole on the {location} indicates intelligence and analytical skills. It suggests that you are logical and capable of finding practical solutions to problems.
A mole on the {location} suggests creativity and a visionary outlook. It indicates that you have innovative ideas and a unique perspective on life.
A mole on the {location} signifies a strong sense of independence and self-reliance. It suggesst that you value freedom and autonomy in your decisions.
A mole on the {location} suggests a charismatic personality and influence over others. It indicates that you have a magnetic presence and can captivate people.

A mole on the {location} signifies good health and vitality. It suggests that you have a strong immune system and physical resilience.
A mole on the {location} suggests a social and outgoing personality. It indicates that you enjoy connecting with people and making new friends.
